name: Matt Meloon's Website
body:
## Welcome to my personal website! Read on to learn more about me.

## About me.
Thank you for visiting my website. I am an 18 year old, undergraduate student in computer science at the University at Buffalo. My objective of this is to find a career in the technology field, primarily in the software engineering or programming field. I'm always looking to gain more knowledge in this field, and in doing so will boost my chances of finding a career in the field that I want. I'm currently a Front End Coordinator at Wegmans Food Markets, a highly reputable company.

##Contact
mmeloon25@yahoo.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
